channel.title: Research on Website of Terence van Zyl
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Website of Terence van Zyl

item.title: Catastrophic Forgetting in Similarity Learning
item.description: This research project looks at the impact of catastrophic forgetting and incremental learning in similarity learning.

item.title: Machine Learning in Finance
item.description: This research project looks at the intersection of finance and machine learning.

item.title: Surrogate Assisted Agent Based Modelling
item.description: Agent-Based Models (ABMs) as complex adaptive simulations which are able to incorporate real world nuance into their design. This research looks at the surrogate (machine learning) assisted agent based modelling.

item.title: Surrogate Assisted Data-Driven Evolutionary Computing
item.description: Interesting applications arises at the intersection of evolutionary computing and machine learning when we capitalise on the strengths of both of these paradigms simultaneously.

item.title: Nedbank Research Chair
item.description: I currently hold the Nedbank Research and Innovation Chair. The Chair is housed at the University of Johannesburg’s Institute for Intelligent systems.
